summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Water Supply System; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in Lot 13, Block 1 of the Plat of Blocks 1 and 2, Aviation Heights Division No. 2, and in an unplatted portion of the northeast one-quarter of Section 3, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., for a watermain pipeline right of way; and providing for the payment therefor.
